channel.title: [CRASH]middle of Blast Pit.
channel.description:
Going up the freight elevator in the middle of the Radioactive pool. Starts loading next part and HL2.exe crashes saying "Can't Load Lump 53, Allocation of 36463957 bytes failed!!!"
No im not on a crappy PC either...
6core cpu, AMD HD 6850 10GB Ram PLENTY of free space

item.title: [CRASH]middle of Blast Pit.
item.dc:creator: me2141
item.description:
johro:

It’s supposed to happen. It clears up when you go up the elevator. Fake radioactive interference.

Woohoo Thanks. i didnt want to have to RMA my video card

Read full topic

item.title: [CRASH]middle of Blast Pit.
item.dc:creator: johro
item.description:
It’s supposed to happen. It clears up when you go up the elevator. Fake radioactive interference.

Read full topic

item.title: [CRASH]middle of Blast Pit.
item.dc:creator: me2141
item.description:
.tekn1k:

I’ve had that happen twice. I reduced the texture details to ‘high’ instead of ‘very high’ and that particular message has not appeared since, however, it crashed twice with the generic ‘hl2.exe has stopped working’ or something to that effect.

When I restart the game and load from previous location, it tends to work past the spot it crashed at. I just restarted my computer and played for a while and no crash occurred during that period of play.

Same.

On another note. I hope this is supposed to happen but… While in the radioactive area my screen starts to get staticy like old TV fuzz. it might just be its soo bright there my Video card is acting up tho… thats why i hope its supposed to happen

Read full topic

item.title: [CRASH]middle of Blast Pit.
item.dc:creator: tekn1k
item.description:
I’ve had that happen twice. I reduced the texture details to ‘high’ instead of ‘very high’ and that particular message has not appeared since, however, it crashed twice with the generic ‘hl2.exe has stopped working’ or something to that effect.

When I restart the game and load from previous location, it tends to work past the spot it crashed at. I just restarted my computer and played for a while and no crash occurred during that period of play.

Read full topic

item.title: [CRASH]middle of Blast Pit.
item.dc:creator: johro
item.description:
Yeah. Exact same thing on my end. Definitely not a hardware issue. HD 7950 here.

Read full topic
